articles.title: Shares Of Vedanta Slide As 0.5% Equity Changes Hands In Large Trade - BQ Prime
articles.description: The mining company had 0.5%, or 2.03 crore, equity shares change hands in four bunched trades.
articles.content:
Shares of Vedanta Ltd. were trading lower by 1.19% at Rs 278.4 apiece, as of 12.21 p.m. on Friday, compared with the advance in the NSE Nifty 50 by 1.09%.
